inventory.commentary: 31JUL06 added examples, features, definition and commentary. ahouston

sense.name: a plan, scheme, suggestion
sense.commentary: PROPOSAL[+document][+plan][+thesis/+design/+business] Note: can be singular or plural Note: usually refers to a tangible plan, such as a document
sense.examples: They are reviewing a set of proposals for a new high-speed rail system. John submitted his thesis proposal to his advisor on Friday.

sense.name: marriage offer
sense.commentary: PROPOSAL[+action][+speech][+offer][+marriage] marriage proposal, proposal of marriage - an offer of marriage Note: a specialized narrow sense of Sense 3
sense.examples: She waited six years for his proposal. His proposal was posted on the billboard at the stadium.

sense.name: the act of making a suggestion or offering a plan
sense.commentary: PROPOSAL[+event][+action][+speech][+suggestion] the act of making a proposal Note: always occurs in the singular Note: implies a specific time and place of speaking
sense.examples: They listened to her proposal. Her proposal was two hours long. His proposal during the meeting yesterday was met with resistance.
